original: @khya@#/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa
analyzed: @khya@#/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa
translated: Praise of the Lord

original: rin po che'i phreng ba/
analyzed: rin po che'i phreng ba/
translated: The Precious Garland🔽The Precious Garland: In Praise of Lokeśvara

original: @/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba bzhugs so/
analyzed: @/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba bzhugs so/
translated: In Sanskrit: Lokīśvara-stotra-ratnamālā

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_lo ki shwa ra sto tra rat+na ma la/_bod skad du/🔽'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba/_dpal ldan 'jig
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_lo ki shwa ra sto tra rat+na ma la/_bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba/_dpal ldan 'jig
translated: In Tibetan: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba🔽Homage to the glorious Lord of the World!

original: rten mgon po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dri med thugs ni stong🔽dang snying rjes brlan/_/lam mkhyen nyid dang thams cad mkhyen nyid la sogs
analyzed: rten mgon po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dri med thugs ni stong dang snying rjes brlan/_/lam mkhyen nyid dang thams cad mkhyen nyid la sogs
translated: The stainless mind of Lokeśvara is moistened with emptiness and compassion,🔽and with the meaning of the path of omniscience and the omniscience of all,

original: don dang tshhig_/gsal bar 'doms pas yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag
analyzed: don dang tshhig_/gsal bar 'doms pas yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag
translated: and so forth, it is fully complete and the body is completely pure.

original: pa'i sku/_/ye shes lhag pa'i bdag pos rol par mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/_/
analyzed: pa'i sku/_/ye shes lhag pa'i bdag pos rol par mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/_/
translated: I bow my head to the play of the lord of superior wisdom.🔽Through the power of the divisions of those to be tamed,

original: gdul bya'i dbye ba'i dbang las rnam pa mang por snang ba yis/_/gcig kyang chu
analyzed: gdul bya'i dbye ba'i dbang las rnam pa mang por snang ba yis/_/gcig kyang chu
translated: many forms appear,🔽and even one is seen as many.

original: snod rnams su gnas pa'i ri bong can mtshhungs las/_/khyod ni gsal bar
analyzed: snod rnams su gnas pa'i ri bong can mtshhungs las/_/khyod ni gsal bar
translated: Oh, how wonderful is your body, which is the most marvelous of miracles,

original: gzhan la phan pa'i rjes su song nyid phyir/_/e ma'o rdzu 'phrul shin tu rmad du🔽byung ba'i sku ni rigs pa lags/_/mu stegs skye bo gdul zhing rab tu rtogs par
analyzed: gzhan la phan pa'i rjes su song nyid phyir/_/e ma'o rdzu 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba'i sku ni rigs pa lags/_/mu stegs skye bo gdul zhing rab tu rtogs par
translated: because you are intent on benefiting others.🔽In order to subdue the tīrthikas and to bring them to full realization,

original: bya don du/_/yongs rdzogs zla ba'i zhal gyi rnam par sgeg pa'i dpral ba yi/_/🔽gnas las dbang phyug chen po lha yi bu ni nges phyung bas/_/lha dang chen po'i mi
analyzed: bya don du/_/yongs rdzogs zla ba'i zhal gyi rnam par sgeg pa'i dpral ba yi/_/ gnas las dbang phyug chen po lha yi bu ni nges phyung bas/_/lha dang chen po'i mi
translated: you manifested from the forehead of the one with a face like a full moon🔽the great Īśvara, the son of the gods,🔽and thus you are the god of gods, the lord of lords.

original: yi shin tu lha dang dbang phyug khyod/_/pad ma'i skye ba pa rnams gdul zhing khong
analyzed: yi shin tu lha dang dbang phyug khyod/_/pad ma'i skye ba pa rnams gdul zhing khong
translated: In order to subdue the lotus-born ones and to bring them to full realization,

original: du chud don du/_/khyod kyi phrag pa legs rgyas chen po'i dge ba'i mtshhan nyid las//
analyzed: du chud don du/_/khyod kyi phrag pa legs rgyas chen po'i dge ba'i mtshhan nyid las//
translated: from the auspicious mark of your well-developed shoulders🔽you manifested the grandson of the gods,

original: mes po lha yis sras po nges par phyung ba nyid kyis ni/_/'jig rten dbang phyug
analyzed: mes po lha yis sras po nges par phyung ba nyid kyis ni/_/'jig rten dbang phyug
translated: and thus you are the lord of the world,

original: dbang phyug mchog la mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/_/skye bo khyab 'jug pa rnams gdul
analyzed: dbang phyug mchog la mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/_/skye bo khyab 'jug pa rnams gdul
translated: I bow my head to the supreme lord,

original: dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/mi bu yang phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thugs ka
analyzed: dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/mi bu yang phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thugs ka
translated: in order to tame and understand the people who are devotees of Vishnu.

original: las/_/nges phyung 'di ni srid pa'i dbang phyug nyid de de'i slad du/_/khyod ni🔽skyes bu rnams kyi mchog las mchod nyid gzhan yod min/_/nyi zlar gus bcas
analyzed: las/_/nges phyung 'di ni srid pa'i dbang phyug nyid de de'i slad du/_/khyod ni skyes bu rnams kyi mchog las mchod nyid gzhan yod min/_/nyi zlar gus bcas
translated: This lord of existence, the lotus-holder, has definitely emerged from🔽the heart of the son of Manu. Therefore,🔽you are the supreme of beings, and there is no other to be worshipped.

original: rim gro bsnyen bkur stobs stob rnams la ni/_/yad dag bstan phyir mthon
analyzed: rim gro bsnyen bkur stobs stob rnams la ni/_/yad dag bstan phyir mthon
translated: In order to show respect, service, reverence, and offering to the sun and moon,🔽the high and low, the beautiful,

original: mthing mdzes pa'i spyan ni gang dag las/_/ri bong spyan dang bla ma nges phyung sa
analyzed: mthing mdzes pa'i spyan ni gang dag las/_/ri bong spyan dang bla ma nges phyung sa
translated: from whose eyes, the eyes of the rabbit and the guru,

original: la mig rnams kyi/_/nang gi mun nag 'joms pa de la bdag ni phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
analyzed: la mig rnams kyi/_/nang gi mun nag 'joms pa de la bdag ni phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
translated: the inner darkness is destroyed, to that I pay homage.

original: dpal mor rim gro bsnyen bskur sbyor ba po rnams gdul ba dang /_/rtogs phyir
analyzed: dpal mor rim gro bsnyen bskur sbyor ba po rnams gdul ba dang /_/rtogs phyir
translated: In order to tame and understand the people who are devotees of Shri,🔽here this Bhagavati, Sarasvati,

original: 'dir ni nges par bcom ldan ma ste dbyangs can 'di/_/rgyal ba'i sras po khyod
analyzed: 'dir ni nges par bcom ldan ma ste dbyangs can 'di/_/rgyal ba'i sras po khyod
translated: is the daughter of the Victorious One,

original: kyi mche ba'i rtshe las rab phyung bas/_/mngon 'dod shes rab 'bras bu ster ba la
analyzed: kyi mche ba'i rtshe las rab phyung bas/_/mngon 'dod shes rab 'bras bu ster ba la
translated: And the fruit of wisdom, which is the fulfillment of one’s own aim,🔽I pay homage to you.

original: bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/rlung gi skye ba pa rnams gdul dang mi bzad lam grub
analyzed: bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/rlung gi skye ba pa rnams gdul dang mi bzad lam grub
translated: Then, in order to tame the wind-born gods and to accomplish the unbearable path,

original: phyir/_/de nas 'jig rten mgon po'i zhal gang zhig las nges phyung 'di/_/🔽rlung lha mchog gi bla ma sa la skye ba pa rnams kyi/_/spyod lam rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu
analyzed: phyir/_/de nas 'jig rten mgon po'i zhal gang zhig las nges phyung 'di/_/ rlung lha mchog gi bla ma sa la skye ba pa rnams kyi/_/spyod lam rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu
translated: This [wind] emerged from the mouth of the Lord of the World.🔽I pay homage to that which bestows the fruit of the four types of conduct🔽Of the wind gods, the supreme gurus born on the earth.

original: ster ba de la bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/chu lha pa rnams gdul dang zhi ba'i lam 'dod
analyzed: ster ba de la bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/chu lha pa rnams gdul dang zhi ba'i lam 'dod
translated: In order to make the water gods and those who desire the path of peace

original: ldan rnams kyi/_/yang dag khong du chud phyir bde gshegs sras po'i lte ba las/_/
analyzed: ldan rnams kyi/_/yang dag khong du chud phyir bde gshegs sras po'i lte ba las/_/
translated: Truly understand, [the wind] emerged from the navel of the Sugata’s son.🔽I pay homage to that which quickly bestows the fruit

original: yang dag phyung ba chu lha'i gtsho bo yang ste myur ba ru/_/'dod dga'i dbang phyug
analyzed: yang dag phyung ba chu lha'i gtsho bo yang ste myur ba ru/_/'dod dga'i dbang phyug
translated: Of the water gods, the lord of desire, the lord of the world.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba
translated: The Precious Garland of Praise to Lokeśvara🔽I constantly pay homage to you, who bestow your own fruit.

original: nyid kyi 'bras bu ster la rtag phyag 'tshhal/_/mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs
analyzed: nyid kyi 'bras bu ster la rtag phyag 'tshhal/_/mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs
translated: The concordant fruit and so forth,

original: mngon par 'dod rnams nges gdul zhing /_/yang dag grub phyir rab mchog
analyzed: mngon par 'dod rnams nges gdul zhing /_/yang dag grub phyir rab mchog
translated: and in order to accomplish the perfect, you are the supreme🔽.

original: mtshhan ldan zhabs kyi pad+ma las/_gang zhig nges par phyung ba bcom ldan nor
analyzed: mtshhan ldan zhabs kyi pad+ma las/_gang zhig nges par phyung ba bcom ldan nor
translated: The one who definitely emerged from the lotus feet of the one endowed with the supreme characteristics is the Bhagavān known as🔽Vairocana,

original: 'dzin mar grags pa/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mnyam med de la bdag
analyzed: 'dzin mar grags pa/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mnyam med de la bdag
translated: the protector of the three worlds, unequaled. I🔽pay homage to him.

original: phyag 'tshhal/_/khyod ni srid las grol kyang de la yang dag gnas pa ni/_/
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal/_/khyod ni srid las grol kyang de la yang dag gnas pa ni/_/
translated: You are liberated from existence, yet abiding in it,

original: sems can tshhogs la snying brtshe nyid las srid pa'i spyod tshhul gyis/_/srid mtha'i
analyzed: sems can tshhogs la snying brtshe nyid las srid pa'i spyod tshhul gyis/_/srid mtha'i
translated: through the conduct of existence for the sake of the multitude of sentient beings,

original: bar du brtan pa bdag ni rtag gnas gyur snyam du/_/dam pa'i bsam pa chen
analyzed: bar du brtan pa bdag ni rtag gnas gyur snyam du/_/dam pa'i bsam pa chen
translated: thinking, “I will always remain until the end of existence,”

original: po'i mchog gyur khyod la phyag bgyi'o/_/nam mkha'i bar du snang ba'i 'jig rten🔽khams rnams khyod nyid kyis/_/rang gi zhabs gcig mthil gyis kyang ni rnam
analyzed: po'i mchog gyur khyod la phyag bgyi'o/_/nam mkha'i bar du snang ba'i 'jig rten khams rnams khyod nyid kyis/_/rang gi zhabs gcig mthil gyis kyang ni rnam
translated: I pay homage to you, the supreme one with the highest intention.🔽The world systems that appear up to the limits of space🔽are completely suppressed by the sole sole of your foot.

original: par gnon pa ste/_/bskal pa'i mtha' ru srid pas rten par 'bar ba drag po'i
analyzed: par gnon pa ste/_/bskal pa'i mtha' ru srid pas rten par 'bar ba drag po'i
translated: At the end of the eon, you remain in existence, blazing with intense heat.

original: me/_/khyod kyis dbugs kyi rlung gi stobs kyis nges par bcil bar gyur/_/🔽rang gi 'dzub mo gyen du gtod de 'dzin pa'i sdigs 'dzub kyis/_/lhun po'i
analyzed: me/_/khyod kyis dbugs kyi rlung gi stobs kyis nges par bcil bar gyur/_/ rang gi 'dzub mo gyen du gtod de 'dzin pa'i sdigs 'dzub kyis/_/lhun po'i
translated: You, Fire, by the power of your breath, have completely extinguished it.🔽With your forefinger raised, you threaten the multitude of mountains,

original: tshhogs rnams du ma g.yo bar gyur cing sen mo yi/_/sbubs kyis gyen du 'dzin🔽pas rgya mtshho'i chu yang lus ma gyur/_/e ma'o 'di lta'i nus pa khyod las gzhan
analyzed: tshhogs rnams du ma g.yo bar gyur cing sen mo yi/_/sbubs kyis gyen du 'dzin pas rgya mtshho'i chu yang lus ma gyur/_/e ma'o 'di lta'i nus pa khyod las gzhan
translated: and with the hollow of your nail you hold up the waters of the ocean.🔽Ah! What other power than yours have I seen?

original: du ci zhig mthong /_/mchog tu mnyen zhing zla ba gzhon nu'i mdzes pa yang dag
analyzed: du ci zhig mthong /_/mchog tu mnyen zhing zla ba gzhon nu'i mdzes pa yang dag
translated: This supreme body of yours, which is so tender and so beautiful as the new moon,

original: par/ston pa'i sku mchog 'di yang lang tshho ma yi yin nam ci/_/'jigs
analyzed: par/ston pa'i sku mchog 'di yang lang tshho ma yi yin nam ci/_/'jigs
translated: is it also the body of a young girl?

original: byed drag po gnon las mi lhongs ci yang dub pa dang /_/gdul bar dka' ba'i
analyzed: byed drag po gnon las mi lhongs ci yang dub pa dang /_/gdul bar dka' ba'i
translated: You are not frightened by the most terrible Rudra, nor are you at all tired,🔽and you subdue the demons who are so difficult to subdue.

original: bdud 'joms pa ni khyod kyi spyod tshhul lags/_kye lags 'di ltar chen po'i skye
analyzed: bdud 'joms pa ni khyod kyi spyod tshhul lags/_kye lags 'di ltar chen po'i skye
translated: Ah! This is the way of the great beings,

original: bo'i ral phreng dang mtshhungs par/_/rang gi dbu skyes mdzes pa'i lan bu 'khyog
analyzed: bo'i ral phreng dang mtshhungs par/_/rang gi dbu skyes mdzes pa'i lan bu 'khyog
translated: whose beautiful hair is like a garland of snakes.

original: po de/_/de nyid me yis nyon mongs bdud shing sbar bar byas pa yi/_/du ba'i🔽phreng ba lta bu dri med khyod la snang bar gyur/_/zla zer cung zad 'phros pa yis ni
analyzed: po de/_/de nyid me yis nyon mongs bdud shing sbar bar byas pa yi/_/du ba'i phreng ba lta bu dri med khyod la snang bar gyur/_/zla zer cung zad 'phros pa yis ni
translated: stream of your stainless deeds, which are the fire that burns the trees of the afflictions and the demons,🔽appears.🔽The light of the moon, which is your mind,🔽is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcur khyab khyod kyis/_/nag po'i phyogs zad chung ngu'i cha bcas 'od🔽kyis mdzes pa ni/_/srid pa rnams su 'dod pa dang myur ri bong can gang de/_/
analyzed: phyogs bcur khyab khyod kyis/_/nag po'i phyogs zad chung ngu'i cha bcas 'od kyis mdzes pa ni/_/srid pa rnams su 'dod pa dang myur ri bong can gang de/_/
translated: The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.

original: cung zad las ni ma lus bsam pa rnam par mdzes/_/mthun par sgros pa'i ngan
analyzed: cung zad las ni ma lus bsam pa rnam par mdzes/_/mthun par sgros pa'i ngan
translated: The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.

original: pa'i lam can lugs 'joms shing /_/mi dang mi min bsam pa rton la lam dang lam/_/yang dag thob byed gzhan don spyod tshhul mchog gis ni/_/mdzes ldan🔽rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/_/mya ngan 'das dang srid mi gnas kyang
analyzed: pa'i lam can lugs 'joms shing /_/mi dang mi min bsam pa rton la lam dang lam/_/yang dag thob byed gzhan don spyod tshhul mchog gis ni/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/_/mya ngan 'das dang srid mi gnas kyang
translated: The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.

original: khyod gnas pa/_/'od gsal rang byin rlab ste sbyor dang phan pa po/_/ma lus
analyzed: khyod gnas pa/_/'od gsal rang byin rlab ste sbyor dang phan pa po/_/ma lus
translated: The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.🔽The moon, which is the mind of the Conqueror, is beautiful with the light of the small part of the darkness that is destroyed in the ten directions.

original: skye bo'i mi dge mi mdzad dge ba yis/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la
analyzed: skye bo'i mi dge mi mdzad dge ba yis/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la
translated: I pay homage to the beautiful Victorious One, the Lord of the Earth,

original: phyag bgyi'o/_/rigs par dpag med 'od zer phreng bas yang dag bskor/_/🔽de las bde skyed mtshho skyes rang gi phyag gis 'dzin/_/rjes mthun dga' ba thob
analyzed: phyag bgyi'o/_/rigs par dpag med 'od zer phreng bas yang dag bskor/_/ de las bde skyed mtshho skyes rang gi phyag gis 'dzin/_/rjes mthun dga' ba thob
translated: who is surrounded by a garland of immeasurable light rays,🔽who holds in his own hand the wish-fulfilling jewel that grants bliss,🔽and who is delighted by the attainment of perfect joy and bliss.

original: pa yang dag dga' bde yis/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag
analyzed: pa yang dag dga' bde yis/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag
translated: I pay homage to the beautiful Victorious One, the Lord of the Earth,

original: bgyi'o/_/chos kyi dbyings las kun mchog snying rje rang nyid gtsho/_/gang
analyzed: bgyi'o/_/chos kyi dbyings las kun mchog snying rje rang nyid gtsho/_/gang
translated: who is the embodiment of the supreme compassion that arises from the dharmadhatu,

original: zhig dge ba la sogs tshhogs rnams yang dag rdzogs/_/rnam par rtog spangs
analyzed: zhig dge ba la sogs tshhogs rnams yang dag rdzogs/_/rnam par rtog spangs
translated: who has perfected the accumulations of virtue and so forth,🔽and who, through his power, teaches by means of sound, having abandoned conceptualization.

original: mthu las sgra yis ston pa po/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/_/
analyzed: mthu las sgra yis ston pa po/_/mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/_/
translated: I pay homage to the beautiful Victorious One, the Lord of the Earth,🔽who is filled with hundreds of delightful Dharma discourses,

original: de bzhin nyid dang nyid min gnyis med kun dga' brgyas/_/yongs su gang
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang nyid min gnyis med kun dga' brgyas/_/yongs su gang
translated: which are neither the same as nor different from suchness,

original: bar mdzad pa brgya phrag chos kyi gtam/_/'thad ldan mchog tu bde na zhing
analyzed: bar mdzad pa brgya phrag chos kyi gtam/_/'thad ldan mchog tu bde na zhing
translated: and which are filled with hundreds of delightful Dharma discourses.

original: rigs par gsungs pa yi/_/'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la bdag🔽phyag 'tshhal/_/mi mchog de yi rang gi sku ni 'gro la rab 'phro ba/_/mtshho skyes
analyzed: rigs par gsungs pa yi/_/'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/mi mchog de yi rang gi sku ni 'gro la rab 'phro ba/_/mtshho skyes
translated: I pay homage to the supreme king of Jambudvipa,🔽the lord of men, whose body is radiant to all beings,

original: spyan gyis shin tu mdzes par gyur pa yi/_/ma lus sems can rnams kyi myur ba'i
analyzed: spyan gyis shin tu mdzes par gyur pa yi/_/ma lus sems can rnams kyi myur ba'i
translated: whose eyes are extremely beautiful,🔽the supreme king of Jambudvipa, who quickly brings🔽the highest liberation to all sentient beings without exception.

original: thar mchog gi/_/'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po dam par bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/
analyzed: thar mchog gi/_/'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po dam par bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/
translated: I pay homage to the supreme king of Jambudvipa,🔽who delights in the supreme emanation and enjoyment bodies for the sake of others,

original: mchog tu sprul dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gzhan don dgyes/_/stong nyid gos
analyzed: mchog tu sprul dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gzhan don dgyes/_/stong nyid gos
translated: who is clothed in emptiness,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba
translated: the garland of jewels praising Lokeśvara

original: med chos 'dzin pa la dgyes pa can/_/grub pa dam pa rnam sad 'dzin ma'i
analyzed: med chos 'dzin pa la dgyes pa can/_/grub pa dam pa rnam sad 'dzin ma'i
translated: who delights in upholding the Dharma of non-existence,🔽the lord of Jambudvipa, who holds the supreme accomplishment of the fully awakened ones,

original: dbang po ste/_/nor 'dzin dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/
analyzed: dbang po ste/_/nor 'dzin dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la bdag phyag 'tshhal/_/
translated: I pay homage to the supreme king of Jambudvipa,🔽who speaks everything from the mouth of the moon-faced one

original: mchog tu lhan skyes dam pa'i rgya mtshhor zla zhal gyi/_/sgo las thams cad gsung ba
analyzed: mchog tu lhan skyes dam pa'i rgya mtshhor zla zhal gyi/_/sgo las thams cad gsung ba
translated: in the supreme ocean of innate bliss.

original: ma lus ngag tshhig ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshhan nyid rjes mthun rgyan gyis phul//🔽dbang phyug 'dzin ma'i rgyal po dam par phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'jig rten dbang
analyzed: ma lus ngag tshhig ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshhan nyid rjes mthun rgyan gyis phul// dbang phyug 'dzin ma'i rgyal po dam par phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'jig rten dbang
translated: I offer this garland of praise, which is in accord with the characteristics of nirvana.🔽I pay homage to the excellent king of the lord of lords.

original: phyug bstod pa rin chen phreng ba ni/_/dpal ldan nags kyi rin chen zhabs kyis
analyzed: phyug bstod pa rin chen phreng ba ni/_/dpal ldan nags kyi rin chen zhabs kyis
translated: This Precious Garland of Praise to the Lord of the World🔽was composed by the glorious Vanaratna.

original: bgyis pa las/_/de yi gtshang ma'i dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa/_/de nyid
analyzed: bgyis pa las/_/de yi gtshang ma'i dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa/_/de nyid
translated: Whatever merit I have obtained from this,🔽may it become auspicious for the entire world.

original: kyis ni 'jig rten kun du bzang por gyur/_/bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba 'di
analyzed: kyis ni 'jig rten kun du bzang por gyur/_/bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba 'di
translated: This Precious Garland of Praise is complete.

original: ni rdzogs so//_// rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pan+ti ta chen po nags kyi rin po che'i zhal snga nas
analyzed: ni rdzogs so//_// rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pan+ti ta chen po nags kyi rin po che'i zhal snga nas
translated: It was composed by the great Indian pandit Vanaratna of the east.

original: mdzad pa'o/_/mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyis spyan sngar/_dge slong rgya mtshho'i sde🔽zhes bya bas bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer chen po'i 'dabs dpal go pi tshan+d+ra'i
analyzed: mdzad pa'o/_/mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyis spyan sngar/_dge slong rgya mtshho'i sde zhes bya bas bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer chen po'i 'dabs dpal go pi tshan+d+ra'i
translated: In his presence, the monk Samudradhvaja

original: gtshug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: gtshug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: translated it at the great temple of Gopichandī in the vicinity of the great city of Yemar in Nepal.
